channel.title: Machinima-The Bivium
channel.description:
[b][COLOR='Red']We need [/b][COLOR='Red'][b][u][i]voice actors[/i][/u][/b]
[b][i][COLOR='Red']THIS MACHINIMA IS ABOUT THE MISSING STORYLINE BETWEEN HALF-LIFE 1 AND HALF-LIFE 2. IT WILL ALSO COVER SOME STORYLINE AFTER GORDON ARRIVES...SUCH AS HOW THE JALOPY (musclecar/69 dodge charger) GOT OVER TO THE OTHER SIDE OF THAT BRIDGE AND ALSO HOW MOSSMAN RETRIEVES THE COORDINATES FOR THE LOCATION OF THE BOREALIS.[/i][/b] Well folks...my friend: Gordon Freebird (also known as "some random guy named josh") and I have had this idea since October 2009. We've changed it a ton tho...and I need more voice actors...I need someone to do doctor breen and other voices. I'm doing: The mapping, server, faceposer, camera angles, music, video editing, special effects, uploading to youtube, and story...Josh is helping with the story as well obviously...Anyway..I came up with the name after discussing it with josh a ton I decided to just use "The Bivium". Josh is doing a bunch of stuff too in garry'smod with me...camera angles recording his voice, helping me out and stuff. This machinima will add onto the Half-life universe. It will show how doctor mossman found the Borealis and other things...such as a group of us coming from city 11 and the assassination attempt on breen was a failure and now we decide to make our way to the top and try to kill breen. These are the events between half-life one and half life 2. We need someone to do music and some stuff because this will be too much frustration for me...I'm only in high school and you know... [COLOR='MediumTurquoise'] [COLOR='black']Audio Explanation::
Part1: Part2: Part3: Part4: Part5: (Had to make it in parts because the whole thing was 70 megabytes and supload.com only allows 20 mb files)
Here is the cast so far:
Josh-Gordon Freebird============>Male_02(Ted)-Actor: Josh Av3nger/Trevor-av3nger==========>Male_07(Mike)-Actor: av3nger KillerBen=======================>Male_09(Erdin)-Actor: "Killer" (KillerBen) Ellis===========================>Male_04(Eric)-Actor: Ellis Axell(christmans pany)==========>Male_05(Art)-Actor: [SVC] Pany redman (or red for short)=======>Male_08(Vance)-Actor: Red_Man Highway (I'm gonna call em sgt)=>Male_06(Sandro):Actor TBG Highway [b][B][COLOR='Red'][B]Lunatic Sniper==================>Male_01(Van)-Actor: Lunatic[/b] -new, yes he's in our clan by the way.[/B][/B]
If you're gonna' be a voice actor I need you to record your voice with sound recorder or audacity or whatever. You need to say stuff like "Grenade! Get down! shit! and showing anger like Ill kill all the combine just to get a shot at [COLOR='Lime']breen and stuff like that. For complicated arguments we will all have to talk it over in my server: [COLOR='Red'][b]24.144.179.42:27015 [/b]that my dad helped me set up. Fast download has been a biotch and I wasn't able to completely set it up. Anyway...what I'm saying is for discussions in the movie itself I will have to tell you what I said about something and then what josh said and who this said...of course...so you can make a proper response to the retort or suggestion the person said with your recording through audacity or w/e.
[b][COLOR='Cyan']As well, we need combine voices...[/b]that I'm hoping you will edit yourselves...[b]We need [COLOR='Magenta']girls[/b]...heheheheh...and we might even need a person to do the [COLOR='Red']combine death radio overwatch woman voice...We will need many actors throughout the machinima...hopefully people stay loyal to the thread and movie when they join us. The machinima will be in episodes...
I, myself have already done over 20 .vcd animations for my own character in advance...and they're really good actually. yes, I'm including great facial animation...I need your help...and I need it now if you all can..."Thank you..for your PATIENCE!"
[b][B][B][B][COLOR='Red']Can somebody [i]please[/i] tell me exactly how to set up fast download step by step?[/b][/B][/B][/B]
More positions/a list:
[COLOR='Red'][b]-all female rebels -combine -metropolice (possibly) -combine overwatch automated woman voice -vortigaunts (most likely telling the stories of the 7 hour war to others, that's a good idea!) -maybe even headcrabs...(we might keep default...but it'd be cool if someone acted out new ones) -[B][B][i][u]all female rebels are still open, we need girls![/u][/i][/b][/B] -mappers -3d modeler -animators (more animations for faceposer use and choreography) -texture artists -sound effects and music creation (must be similar to valve's but it doesn't really matter that much!) -more faceposer and choreography people! (^_^) (If you can do your own character's animations and gestures and choreography that's a plus!)[/B]
apply now while positions are open...thank you all for your support!:3
Here's that video I promised! [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=52HmNaJTv-A[/url]

item.description:
Okay, it’s time to revive this thread…Some new media is up…basically, it’s just an audio explanation from me what the movie is about and what’s going on with it.

Read full topic

item.title: Machinima-The Bivium

item.description:
I’ll be glad to do some mapping, Give me an idea of an example you would want, and I’ll get to work on it.

Read full topic

item.title: Machinima-The Bivium
item.dc:creator: _amp_955_dam
item.description:
av3nger:

Wow, pretty good…is that actually you or just an example…I’m not sure where I would use a cat tho…

By the way I have seen that trailer before. I kinda’ didn’t like the sliding screenshots…But it’s still a great work and effort.

His cat sounds are awesome, don’t diss 'em. :3

Lolipopman:

Actually, I didn’t make it. Adam did.

av3nger:

adam…?

Hmm.

Anyway, like I said, and like I’ll talk about over steam, I’m happy to do some Visual Effects, including intros, blah blah blah.
As well as voice acting and sound effects, I can do combine sounds as well.

Read full topic

item.title: Machinima-The Bivium
item.dc:creator: av3nger
item.description:
Lolipopman:

Actually, that post wasn’t referred to you but to FrozenCham. It’s swedish for Lolwut.

I don’t know why I replied to your statement, I meant to just state that I’m making more progress. This thread isn’t here to just look at and read guys! It’s a thread for people who wanna’ be in a movie! This movie.

Read full topic

Actually, that post wasn’t referred to you but to FrozenCham. It’s swedish for Lolwut.

item.title: Machinima-The Bivium
item.dc:creator: av3nger
item.description:
horizonbreakk:

Whoa…easy. Your not paying us are you? hmmmmm…

Anyways, this is a web site for a source mod, MAYBE you should check a site with strictly voice actors like here and here

I’m 15, I can’t afford to pay you…haha. Anyway, you get instant stardom…you cannot pass this up. It’s THE EVENTS BEFORE HL2!

All women/girls/ladies and other peeps should read the front page for open actor slots. [COLOR=‘Red’]All female rebels are open. :freeman::meh:

Read full topic

item.title: Machinima-The Bivium
item.dc:creator: horizonbreakk
item.description:
av3nger:

I checked out that film recorder…I’m kind of disappointed in the lack of excitement of this thread…you have to realize that I need the crew not in months years…I need some people who can do some stuff now…Like I was saying…this idea has been floating around and in my mind since october, 2009. Last post from someone was you adam from march 1st…it is now march 6th…if I can only get people to post here every 5 days that’s pretty useless to me and the whole point of the movie…I’ve been patient…waiting for some people who have talent…do I really need to explain this into more detail? maybe I should quadruple bold everything on the front page then?

Whoa…easy. Your not paying us are you? hmmmmm…

Anyways, this is a web site for a source mod, MAYBE you should check a site with strictly voice actors like here and here

Read full topic

item.title: Machinima-The Bivium
item.dc:creator: Lolipopman
item.description:
Well, you wanted voice actors, right? As far as I know, there’s only one voice actor who frequently checks these forums. The talents you’ll meet on here are usually in the visual field, such as painting, or 3d modeling.

Read full topic

Well, when the official one is released, I’m happy to fiddle around with it.

item.title: Machinima-The Bivium
item.dc:creator: av3nger
item.description:
λdam:

If you have a high-end PC, use fraps, if not, use Source Recorder. It’s complicated to use at first, but you get used to it.

I used to use source recorder a couple times but it’s not really good enough…very buggy and fire effects don’t usually show up correctly…I honestly think a 9800gtx+ should be good enough for fraps…if not…that’s rediculous. I think fraps version 3.0.3 just fails. Wanna get my mom to actually buy fraps tho. 3.1.1 is probably better. I really like how it can record any directx program.

Read full topic

item.title: Machinima-The Bivium
item.dc:creator: av3nger
item.description:
Harry-UK:

Here’s a quick combine-soldier test I just made; turned out better than I expected.

https://www.supload.com/listen?s=hMjnxP

Attention:

Modelers needed…
also, check the front page for other positions…I just got adobe flash and after effects onto my computer so that’s cool.

What’s a good video recorder…other than fraps?
By the way…that lip sync I did was not a “run through”. I use windows 7 so I do it manually. Either way, it beats speech api sdk 5.1. Sorry I meant…not a “dry-run”. I wasn’t trying to sound mean really… :\

Read full topic
